body: For those of you who don't know the story, here's what I remember so far. The boy who is the MC gets bullied by those delinquent girls in his class and one day when he gets to buy a cola, he unexpectedly can possess anyone's body through a kiss or by drinking a pill (I'm the same as confused as you). And there he goes playing around with his bullier until the end of the 1st volume. So, when the 2nd volume comes out, it's incomplete; maybe as far as half of this volume or close to the end. And he got another peculiar ability that lets him change his victim's bodies at will (as you can see in this part) while they're in this entranced/empty state after he uses his miracles on them. And there goes the rest which I could not fully grasp yet, as the 1st part was translated into a language that I could understand at the moment, the English language.
